edu.jhu.rebar

Interface StagedDataCollection

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Corpus, Graph
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AccumuloBackedCorpus, AccumuloBackedGraph, AccumuloBackedStagedDataCollection, FileBackedCorpus, RiakCorpus, RiakStagedDataCollection

    public interface StagedDataCollection
    Base interface for corpora and graphs.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      Free any resources used by this corpus.
      void deleteStage(Stage stage)
      Delete a specified stage.
      String getName()
      Return the name of this corpus.
      Stage getStage(int stageId)
      Look up and return the existing stage with the given id.
      Stage getStage(String stageString)
      Return the specified stage.
      Stage getStage(String stageName, String stageVersion)
      Look up and return the existing stage with the given name and version.
      SortedSet<Stage> getStages()
      Return the set of all stages that have generated output for this corpus, sorted by their integer ids (i.e., by the order in which they were created).
      boolean hasStage(String stageName, String stageVersion)
      Return true if a stage with the given name and version exists.
      Stage makeStage(String stageName, String stageVersion, Set<Stage> dependencies, String description, boolean deleteIfExists)
      Create and return a new stage with the given name, version, and list of dependencies.
      void markStagePublic(Stage stage)
      Mark the given stage as "public." This should be done only after the stage has been fully written.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Return the name of this corpus.

      • close

        void close()
           throws RebarException
        Free any resources used by this corpus.
        Throws:
        RebarException

      • makeStage

        Stage makeStage(String stageName,
              String stageVersion,
              Set<Stage> dependencies,
              String description,
              boolean deleteIfExists)
                throws RebarException
        Create and return a new stage with the given name, version, and list of dependencies. The new stage will be assigned a new stageId that is unique within the corpus and is greater than the stageId of any existing stages.
        Parameters:
        dependencies - The stages that the new stage depends on.
        description - A string description of this stage. This should contain a human-readable description of exactly what the stage adds.
        deleteIfExists - Controls behavior if a stage with the given name and version already exists in this collection. If true, then delete the existing stage before returning. If false, then raise an exception.
        Throws:
        RebarException

      • markStagePublic

        void markStagePublic(Stage stage)
                     throws RebarException
        Mark the given stage as "public." This should be done only after the stage has been fully written. For a stage to be marked public, all of its dependencies must first be marked public. Once a stage has been marked as public, it can not be made unpublic.
        Throws:
        RebarException

      • getStage

        Stage getStage(String stageName,
             String stageVersion)
               throws RebarException
        Look up and return the existing stage with the given name and version.
        Throws:
        RebarException

      • getStage

        Stage getStage(int stageId)
               throws RebarException
        Look up and return the existing stage with the given id.
        Throws:
        RebarException

      • getStage

        Stage getStage(String stageString)
               throws RebarException
        Return the specified stage. If stageString has the form NNN:VVV, then NNN is treated as the name and VVV as the version. Otherwise, stageString is treated as a stage name, and the most recently created *public* stage with the given name is returned.
        Throws:
        RebarException

      • getStages

        SortedSet<Stage> getStages()
                           throws RebarException
        Return the set of all stages that have generated output for this corpus, sorted by their integer ids (i.e., by the order in which they were created).
        Throws:
        RebarException

      • hasStage

        boolean hasStage(String stageName,
               String stageVersion)
                 throws RebarException
        Return true if a stage with the given name and version exists.
        Throws:
        RebarException

      • deleteStage

        void deleteStage(Stage stage)
                 throws RebarException
        Delete a specified stage. This will fail (and raise an exception) if any other stage depends on the given stage.
        Throws:
        RebarException
